column2: Layer 2 PoE switch with a silent

column1: "Weight": "Without mounting brackets: 2.8 kg (6.2 lb)\n   With mounting brackets: 2.9 kg (6.4 lb)"
"Networking interface": "(16) GbE RJ45 ports\n(2) 1G SFP ports"
"Max. PoE wattage per port by PSE": "PoE+: 32W"
"Ambient operating temperature": "-5 to 40° C (23 to 104° F)"

"Layer 2 features": "IGMP snooping
STP / RSTP with priorities and port-level disable
Port isolation
Storm control
Voice VLAN
Port mirroring
LACP port aggregation
Multicast / broadcast rate limiting
MAC address blocking
Flow control
802.1X control
Jumbo frames
Proprietary loop protection
DHCP snooping / guarding
Egress rate limit
LLDP-MED
Port restricted by MAC"
